alert.note: Alert for Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 7:56PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marinette and central Oconto Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 756 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Pound, or 15 miles west of Marinette, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marinette and Menominee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
